text: misr ke jis vyakti ne use khareeda, usane apanee stree se kaha, "isako achchhee tarah rakhana. bahut sambhav hai ki yah hamaare kaam aae ya ham ise beta bana len." is prakaar hamane us bhoobhaag mein yoosuf ke qadam jamaane kee raah nikaalee (taaki use pratishtha pradaan karen) aur taaki maamalon aur baaton ke parinaam se ham use avagat karaen. allaah to apana kaam karake rahata hai, kintu adhikatar log jaanate nahin
